description:
Fwupd 2.0.4 open-source Linux firmware updater utility is now available for download with new features and various bug fixes. Here's what's new!

The post Fwupd 2.0.4 Linux Firmware Updater Released with New Features and Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fwupd 2.0.4 Linux Firmware Updater Released with New Features and Bug Fixes
